Package net.xqhs.flash.core.support

Interface Pylon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.xqhs.util.config.Configurable, ConfigurableEntity<Node>, Entity<Node>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPylonImplementation, LocalPylon, WebSocketPylon
    public interface Pylon
extends ConfigurableEntity<Node>
    This interface should be implemented by any persistent entity that exists on a Node and offers to agents services such as communication, mobility, directory, etc.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

      • getSupportedServices

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSupportedServices()
        Returns:
        the names of services that the instance supports. FIXME: services should be better described or be part of some class.

      • getRecommendedShardImplementation

        java.lang.String getRecommendedShardImplementation​(AgentShardDesignation shardType)
        Retrieves the name of the class for an agent shard implementation that is recommended by this support infrastructure, for the specified shard type, if any. If no such recommendation exists, null will be returned.

        This is especially appropriate for cases in which the implementation of the shards depends strongly on the infrastructure, such as messaging and mobility. Using this method, agents can be easily implemented by adding the shards recommended by the pylon.

        Parameters:
        shardType - - the type/name of the shard to be recommended.
        Returns:
        the name of the class containing the recommended implementation, or null if no recommendation is made.
